about_the_game:
Includes the following items:

● Triple Content Set
- Van's Mishy Suit
- Holo Core Voice - R.A.
- Trails in the Sky BGM Selections
● Xipha Basic Quartz Set
Contains seven basic quartz that boost characters' stats when equipped.

- Items can be redeemed by selecting the added bundle(s) from the DLC tab under 'Items' in the Main Menu in-game.
- After redeeming the item(s), go to 'Costumes' under 'Equipment' in the Main menu to change outfits.
- After redeeming the item(s), go to 'Change Holo Core' in the Orbment menu to change holo core voices.
- After redeeming the item(s), go 'BGM Selection Service' in the Marduk Support menu to change the BGM within the Märchen Garten.
